price: I ne pripisujte uz Allaha boga drugoga! Ja sam vam Njegov upozoritelj jasni!"
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
